_comment: Example configuration file for hump-yard file monitoring daemon
_comment2: Copy this file to one of the following locations:
_comment6: Or specify custom path with: folder-monitor start -c /path/to/config.json

folders._comment: Example 1: Monitor Pictures folder recursively for image files
Example 2: Monitor Downloads folder (non-recursive) for documents
Example 3: Monitor uploads folder recursively for all file types

_usage_notes.path: Absolute path to the folder to monitor
_usage_notes.plugin: Name of the plugin to process files
_usage_notes.extensions: List of file extensions to process (default: all files)
_usage_notes._info: Each plugin may accept additional parameters. Add them directly to the folder configuration.
_usage_notes._note4: Available built-in plugins (templates, not fully implemented):
_usage_notes._info2: See documentation on how to create and register custom plugins for your specific needs
